About Me

Hello! I'm Zubayer Hossain, a full stack developer currently love to build project with Vue.JS, React.JS and Laravel.

I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to build products that solve problems, have business value and provide performant experiences.

Shortly after graduating from Daffodil International University, I joined the IT team at AH&Z Associates Ltd where I work on a wide variety of interesting and meaningful projects.

Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

  • PHP(OOP)
  • Laravel
  • MySQL
  • Restful API
  • JavaScript (ES6+)
  • HTML, CSS, SASS, XML, JSON
  • Vue.Js / React.Js
  • Bootstrap, Vuetify & Material-UI
  • Amazon web services
  • Git and Github (Version Control)
  • Apache, Nginx

Experience

Full stack developer  @  AH&Z Associates Ltd

Feb 2020 - Present

  • Developing complex CRM using VueJs and Laravel.
  • Creating and designing Restful APIs.
  • Solving problems, modifying UI and ensuring responsive user interface.
  • Managing complex relational database, clean code and design patterns.
  • Working with third party APIs, managing data and maintaining AWS cloud server & web services.
  • Communicating and collaborating with team of engineers, designers and producers on a daily basis.

Things I’ve Built

Weather App

A responsive weather app that fetches weather forecast from OpenWeather API. It shows current weather information with forthcoming 6 days forecast built with Vue.js and Larvael. Secured api token and limited the api hitting rate. For city longitude and latitude data used Algolia API.

  • Vue.js
  • Laravel
  • OpenWeather

To-Do App

A to-do app to sharpen my react hooks skill. Used jsonplaceholder's endpoint to fetch data and crud todo. For managing state context api is used. The UI is user friendly to add todo and mark complete after completing the todo.

  • React.js
  • Hooks
  • Context Api

JavaScript Cardio Algorithm

A collection of JavaScript coding challenges / Algorithms / Data Structures, from beginner to advanced level.

  • JavaScript
  • Problem Solving

My Portfolio

A clean, beautiful and responsive portfolio. Modern UI Design. One Page Layout built with HTML & JavaScript. Custom SASS. Fully Responsive. Configurable color scheme, image optimization & easy site customization

  • HTML
  • JavaScript
  • SASS

MyEcommerce

An ecommerce application templated with ecommerce frontend and created backend to crud products, products category, products brand and lot more.

  • Laravel
  • Blade
  • MySQL
